Test Name: MAYOCOMPLETE Melanoma Panel, Next-Generation Sequencing, Tumor
Purpose: To analyze DNA from tumor tissue using next-generation sequencing to identify genetic variants associated with melanoma.
Equipment: Next-generation sequencer (e.g., Illumina HiSeq or MiSeq), spectrophotometer (NanoDrop), fluorometer (Qubit), PCR thermal cycler, qPCR system, Bioanalyzer or TapeStation
